name: Scribbles
description:
Have you ever wanted to peek under your bed at night?

You returned home after a long day at school, it gets dark so you decide to go to bed, you can't sleep in bed and you decide to draw a little, but you can't concentrate on doing something, so you decide to leave your notebook at the foot of your bed which is only lit with a night light ...

... While you were falling asleep you hear a sound under the bed, when you peak to find the source of the sound you see that someone or something drew on your notebook.
